content.detailedDescription: I was out on my deck listening to the local sheriffs office serving a search warrant a few blocks away, and was looking up towards the sky.  i normally would not have been outside at that hour.  i noticed movement in the corner of my eye, like a shadow or something.  i wear glasses, and it was like seeing something outside of the frame of my glasses, so i moved my head to see what it was.  it was then i saw 6 very dimly lit reddish/orange lights all moving quickly in unison in the shape of a v.  there was absolutely no sound.  it was almost like the individual lights were on a single object because they were moving perfectly together.  i can't recall if the object was solid, or appeared transparent.  i tried to grab my cell phone to record it, but by the time i got the camera app opened, the object was gone.  this was the first time i had every witnessed anything like this.  i've added a very crude sketch of what i saw (i am not an artist).
content.summary: 6 v shaped dim redish lights flying in sync in v shape

content.detailedDescription: White light height of a helicopter in the western sky coming maybe south east normal speed of a hwlicopter. only a very bright white light observed at first. no sound, stopped on a dime maybe 30 miles east, turned on a green hue and went maybe 500 mph straight down. no sound or light after that.
content.summary: Turned green and then took a 90 degree turn straight down

content.detailedDescription:
1. i had stepped outside for a cigarette around 1230 at night.
2. it was very hard to miss. very out of place.
3. maybe an airplane, but then it went back and forth, like a pendulum.
4. it was, what i had thought, was one blue/white pulsating light just kind of sitting there, then it started to move to the left, then it hovered for a moment. moved back to the right, hovered. this happened twice in a short period of time.
5. during, i could've sworn i was seeing things. it seemed impossible. after, i felt like i've either gone crazy or i've seen something that scared the life out of me. i felt very afraid, very uncomfortable. i feel that way even writing this.
6. it flashed, almost like a camera, and then it was gone.
content.summary: Lights in the horizon dancing and then a big flash.

content.detailedDescription: This event caused a very serious altercation between my colluges and myself. the abduction of chris lasted approximately 2 hours of which he cannot remember. after a trip to the local hospital several small objects were found in the back of his head.
content.summary: Abductees

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside stargazing. i have seen spirits, etc, but never anything like this. it was breath taking, and heart stopping. i stood looking up towards the horizon northish, i suppose. not good with direction. i was observing cassiopeia. it was then that i saw a large light craft. it was apparition like on the outside, but within the blinding light, it appeared to be a solid metallic object, oval on top, but circular in shape underneath. it had a window or transparent front on top, and within it i could make out briefly, someone, who looked ghost like. they were made of light too it appeared. but, they did not look like us. they were humanish, but had a larger head on top, and i couldn't see anything else. i was too blinded by the lights that seemed to switching back and forth.Purple, from white, white from blue, and back to purple in some form of sequence. it made my heart drop into my stomach in fright. it was beautiful, but it was scary too. i stood there feeling dizzy, then my head went blank for a few seconds. my cat started staring too. my son came outside, he is 8, and it was still there. a few moments of being out of it, i heard him saying "mom, mom" and i snapped out of it. he asked me what it was, and stood looking at it too. then, it rose up higher into the air, there was no sound, but i know i heard a light buzzing sound. the buzzing was giving a feeling of vertigo. as it came up higher, it sent down a beam, but before it could send it down all fo the way, the sound of a helicopter was in the distance. then the beam went back up, and it took off. i saw it zip off to the south, then back to the original location above us int he north, and then went off into the east, and was gone. a few seconds later, a black helicopter approached, and flew over us. it was all black, no markings, i couldn't even see the driver. it went into the same direction that this craft, being, i have no idea went. me and my son stayed in the spot we were in for a long time just totally in shock or something. i was confused. then the weird feeling of floating went away, the dizziness went away after that, and we went back in. that is when my daughter said, "that is a ufo. i knew that anyhow, but i didn't want to make such a huge claim. she told me to look for a place to report, and here i am. the helicopter has been back in this area, three times already within the last hour and a half. otherwise, the whole event itself only lasted for 8 minutes and some change. very quick sighting.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a huge white lit up object, pulsating purple, white, and blue lights, zipping around crazily, followed by black helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: You talked to my wife before and asked her if i ate after 9pm.She told you the truth as i do because i stay up all night long. you did not ask her if she had any problems herself with this.She had gotten me up numerous times because she felt that someone was touching her or opening the door to our closet. she would yell out to me while i was in the living room and then tell me what had happened.You ignored me when i told you about my abduction and now it seems that it is happening again.As it was dark they tried to get me again,i fought back and they left after i hit the 1.I also have white marks on both wrists and blood marks on my hands and forearms to show that i have been tied down. if you do not believe me,that is fine i will go to someone else forhellp
content.summary: I hit it and scraped my 2 knuckles and blood came out of my hand

content.detailedDescription: I woke up for work around six and went outside to take the dog out and smoke a cigarette. as i open the door i saw a bright star like object moving from the west towards me which was east then it took a slight northeastern flight path. to my naked eye it just look like a bright star but after viewing the video that i shot of it i realize that it was a doughnut shaped object.
content.summary: Bright star-like object moving at rapid speed with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
In my back garden
i noticed the object as i looked up and saw it burst through the low clouds over head and sharply head sw around a 3 seconds it was gone.When i saw it all i could say was wow and it was gone. i know it wasnt from here glowed pure brilliant light and traveled faster than any jet or plane it was more the elemated white glow all around it.3 se s and the object was gone before hand i noticed a orange glow shifting overhead very slowly it was a black helicopterqo
content.summary: Large cylinder glowing pure light at awesome speedt

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on our balcony in a very quiet area of midtown ocala, fl 34471, enjoying watching the chimney swifts that fly before dusk when we spotted an object fairly high in the sky which we first assumed to be a turkey vulture or possibly an eagle except that it was staying in one spot for much longer than would be usual for a soaring bird. frantically ran and grabbed the vid cam ….Is it a bird is it plane is it a balloon? this thing appeared to change shapes and form numbers. we are stumped.
content.summary: Changed shapes, 6, 8, 9, g - very odd

content.detailedDescription: Went out with my dog heard what sounded like a rocket. look up through trees an over my house saw bright orange light coming at me getting bigger .Step back and it made sharp right turn nw. went up 90 degrees and it or was gone with lightone getting smailer.Have gone out manytimes at sametime and not seen anymore lights in same flight plane.
content.summary: Heard sound looked up through trees to see orange light coming at me getting bigger then it turned right heading n. to it was gone

content.detailedDescription: This was witnessed by myself while en route to minot nd, driving my personal vehicle. i had previously been assigned to minot afb in 1985, and was a capt on a b-52 crew when i separated in  1990. i was returning to visit friends and family in 1992. what i witnessed was in fairly under-populated area on a stretch of hwy 2/52 that had about an 8 to 10 mile visual shot of the horizon to the west due to terrain. i had not seen oncoming or trailing traffic in sometime. the road is a 2 lane blacktop running parallel to a set of active railroad tracks. i noticed an extremely brilliant light cresting the horizon. my immediate thought was oncoming train. i took notice shortly after my initial sighting and thought it was moving at and unusually high speed. shortly after that i could discern the horizon line was below it. i decided to stop my vehicle and try to determine what this was. i pulled to the shoulder of the road and exited my car. i couldn't believe the rate of speed this object was moving. the single bright light was the only thing i could see. my estimates of his speed are 600 to 800 kts. i felt the need to move behind my vehicle. the tracks were approx 100 yds from the road. it went by me with no change in altitude or direction. the vehicle stayed directly over the rail tracks during my observation. as it passed, the bright light was no longer visible, but multiple round multi colored random pulsing light came into view. there may have been 5 or 6 of these lights pulsating different colors. this looked to be the propulsion of the craft. the most unexplained part of my experience was the fact that no sound was ever made. i watched until it disappeared over the east horizon. i was shocked. i completed my drive to minot and to this day am trying to understand what i saw. i finished my flying career as an 747 instructor with delta airlines and retired in 2012. in my military and civilian flying careers, i have not seen anything else that i could not explain. this event i cannot. i was curious if anyone else saw this or anything similar.
content.summary: Personal observation of high speed, low altitude ufo

content.detailedDescription: We were going to the elton john concert that night which was at auburn. i was driving and saw a blue cloud in the sky. i thought it was radioactive material from a test at auburn or something like that. i was with one other person that is now deceased. we pulled over when we could see a perfect line to the object. we got out of the car and set on the hood. the blue cloud went away from the ship and its outline was perfectly visible. it had windows made from lights about three i think. never a sound. we watched for a long time and the ship began to cloud up again. we were now getting late to the concert and left. after we got to the concert it was nearly over. i am unsure about the times. if i had the camera and tripod i have now we would have gotten some terrific pictures.
content.summary: At first the ship was clouded in a blue mist. later the mist went away and the ship was perfectly visible.

content.detailedDescription: From my front yard in w torrance i observed partial path of 4 moving dim starlight starlike points of light west/sw la sky ~30 deg 11:50 pm 9/7/15, 3 were staggered straight inline, 1 separate, viewed for ~10 sec separate point object offset from 3 inline which moved on slightly different path. speed & nature of movement weird / suspicious, invoking eerie feeling. all objects  disappeared over pacific ocean at high altitude and distance. i routinely observe night sky. atmosphere was clear w/ a bit of haze. i have an engineering science background.  id: appeared as not airplane nor satellite nor comet, which i observe regularly.  found no online correlation querying just after midnight.
content.summary: 4 moving dim starlight west/sw la sky ~30 deg 11:50pm 9/7/15, 3 inline 1 separate

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home near salt lake city. in the kitchen when something in my mind told me if i went outside amd looked. i would see a ufo. i thought it strange how i was so sure i would see something.
  it was a normal thing for me to go up on the flat roof of my home for a cigarette and the amazing view we had there. i remember as i was walking out, i thought i should grab my phone or camera. but i had the feeling that i shouldn't because then i would see nothing, or it would be a negative thing for me to do so. it was odd but i knew these things. i knew 100% that it was there, from the first thoughts in my kitchen. to walking out the back deck, and up the ladder onto the roof. 
off the top of the ladder, i had 30 feet to walk on the flat roof to the spot where i usually smoked and took in the view. so i decided to walk out looking forward and not looking up at what i was strangly certain was there. also i thought i'd better light my cigarette before looking up. after lighting up i took a breath and looked directly above me to see a stationery silver disc or sphere 1000 feet or so up. literally, directly above my home. incredibly i was not suprised at all, and there became a feeling of it not being a big deal at all. i watched it for 15 minutes or so hovering.
  there was some typical utah summertime  cumulo/thunderhead clouds in the sky near the object. because of that, i believe i got a good perspective on the silvery sphere. it was definitely a solid object, hanging halfway down from the top of the tall dynamic looking cloud. blue sky behind and around the object. tall fluffy cloud to its right side. 
the feeling in me, of it being not a big deal at all was so strong. i said goodbye mentally to it and left the roof. even though it was still up there!
   after i got down to my bedroom. i thought i should get my phone and go back up for a photo because my dad may think i am crazy when i tell him later that day. although the feeling that i knew it would be gone was there. i went back up to see. the cloud had moved into the spot where the object was before. there was nothing to see or photo. and i felt dumb for ignoring my thoughts and even trying to get a picture.
the sighting itself was not was impacted me. i feel like the importance of my experience is in the fact i felt compelled to go outside and see what somehow i knew was there.
content.summary: Observed silver disc/sphere directly above home after feeling compelled to go outside and look

content.detailedDescription:
I looked out my back door window at 12:30 am one morning in late june-after summer solstice-to notice what appeared to be fireflies.  as i have never seen fireflies in this area of ny (too cold and they are "not" bright-white blue) i continued to observe-at 1st- (the sideways v's with strobes so bright white they appeared blue)-it was as if they sensed i was watching them hover above the foliage-at which point these v's appeared to move at 3 sec intervals (according to the strobing) (long enough for me to completely open the blinds to get a better look-) and disappeared from north to south and i was too frightened to try to observe from my front window(my apt sits-north-back..Front faces south)

the foliage is now changing.  the foliage in question has been dead (doornail dead-since 1st week of july)
i'm unnerved..Feeling foolish i have phone photos of select dead foliage-nothing else is dead except for where these v's were hovering above.
content.summary: Strobe sideways v's floating thru yard south to north, 6' above ground dead foilage 2 wks later-appx 4-5 of them of various heights-tallest 7 ft above ground shortest hover-4.5' above ground-foilage is dead dead since 2 weeks after event

content.detailedDescription:
I were working as normal and i was outside on the parking lot, were standing maybe 10-20 meters from the light when i noticed ( in the middle of the parking lot ) and i looked around to see so it wasent any light or something but no lights were on at that time and there are no street light we got that light up like that or even over that place, couldn't see anything strange so im clueless were it comes from but for sure from the sky and it was empty as far i could see.
this light didn't stop it did the same thing all over later i went back in and changed cloth's  and it were gone.

well you can see for your self on this video
notice that it never get outside the 2 white lines
content.summary: Noticed a strange light on ikea parking lot

content.detailedDescription: I have been watching ufo's over earth on tv and thought maybe my experience was reported to someone at the time it happened which could verify my story. which i did not think to do! several years ago i was driving home on hwy 42 from prospect ky to la grange ky from my twin sisters house in the evening hours and i noticed way ahead of me flashing lights. it appeared to be a patrol car as if someone had been pulled over. as i got closer i could see that it was not on the road, but up in the air near the wave 3 television tower. i rolled down my car window as i drove further and when i reached the tower i stuck my head out of the window and tried to look upward at the object hovering right next to the tower about 100 ft above me right beside the road. there was a car behind me and i slowed way down but did not want to stop in the middle of the road. i turned right on hwy 53 about 1/4 mi or less up the road and drove toward la grange so that i could turn around to go back. there is a street right off the hwy on the right i turned on, to turn around. i took the next immediate left and put my car in reverse and backed up. as i was backing up i was looking over my right shoulder and noticed that the object was now very low to the ground and moving slowly through the trees across the same road. it moved slowly toward la grange. i panicked and thought o m g ! it noticed me looking at it and it descended to my level and was following me ! so i put my car in drive pretty fast and took off. i immediately turned right and drove toward la grange in the same direction as the object. i could have driven about a mile up the road and  turned right on fendley mill rd. and driven about 500 ft and it would have been coming right at me. but i was to afraid and rushed home and called my sister to tell her about the incident.  ***** note ***** her husband was an oldham county police officer who along with a couple of other officers, have seen an object at the same wave 3 tower !!!!!!
content.summary: Car size object with blue and red flashing lights (like police patrol car) was hovering beside tower then descent slow moving low to ground

content.detailedDescription: Took my dog to the backyard to go potty and glanced up and thought i saw airplane but observed no movement or sound.Object just hovered high.I had cellphone and took video and was confused as to what i was seeing.Took dog in and took second video as the object hovered.I should mention that the large crescent moon was in the sky but not so close that it could be confused or connected to what i saw.Object was still there when i went back into the house.I thoroughly believe in ufo's and want to believe i saw one but i just don't know.I have no idea how to send the video,sorry
content.summary: Saw what i thought was airplane but no sound or movement appeared to flash slightly

content.detailedDescription:
I know i should of reported this years ago however i was ridiculed by my family after i got home that night so didnt bother reporting it.  i was 12 at the time and i am now 27 and this, to this day, bugs me as i really want to know what it was.  i know its such a cliche, but i know what i saw.

it was around the back end of summer, year 2000 and i had been to a birthday party up easington lane with my best friend callum. being 12 years old it was a sober party, no alcohol and most definitely no drugs. 

after the party, my friend got offered a lift home so left me to walk home by myself (typical- how i wish he too witnessed what i did) on my way home i had to pass through a private housing estate and in the middle of this estate theres a small green area, complete with a half dozen large trees. 

as i walked through this area something in the sky caught my eye and i immediately looked up. there in the sky was a large rocket shaped craft. it had an orange glow right around it, with a green glow encapsulating the orange glow. it made no noise and travelled slowly through the sky in a nw direction. it was very large however i couldnt say exactly how large. it didnt seem very high in the sky but again i wouldn't be able to say exactly how high.  i managed to get a good look at it for around 4-5 seconds before it disappeared over a house.  at that point i ran quickly around the house to get another look at it, which took me all of a couple of seconds, however it was gone.

my initial thought was nasa, as it was obviously not an aeroplane. then it instantly dawned on me that there is no way nasa would have rocket shaped craft in this part of the world. instantly i knew id seen a ufo. my heart began racing and i got so excited (and disappointed callum wasnt there to witness it too) and i ran all the way home (about another half mile) to tell my family what i saw.

when i told them, they laughed it off and ridiculed me. i was so frustrated. 

considering how big it was and how bright, i thought there must have been other witnesses' however i found nothing in the local papers around that time and nothing on the net. for years i have searched the internet for people reporting similar sightings in other parts of the world and i havnt found many. infact i have found none that describe exactly the same thing, and subsequently i have a huge interest in ufo's and aliens now. 

one interesting point i found out a few years ago, thanks to the film "the 4th kind" is that the sumerians left images of apollo shaped craft (exactly like what i saw) in their ancient carvings. i found this very intriguing and admittedly a tad exciting. 

the thought of alien beings visiting our earth doesnt bother me at all. i think its ignorant to believe that we are the only intelligent life in the entire universe. 

i dont tell just anybody about my experience, just certain people. some believe me and some dont. but like i say to them all, i dont care who believes me and who doesnt as i know what i saw. 

id really appreciate it if you could give me any more information on what i saw and/or if others have reported anything similar. 

my apologies for not reporting this sooner but i assure you this is not a hoax and i really hope you could offer me some insight.

thank you very much for taking your time to read this. i really hope i hear from yous.
content.summary: Rocket shaped, initial thought was nasa (rediculous for my part of the world) orange glow right around it with green glow around orang. silent.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv and something told meto go outside.  at first i viewed iybaw ober farm land from about 1/2 mile away it appeared to be an airplan but flying way to low i thought a 747 was crashing.  as i observed closer there weee two beaded bright lights that were described as star like in reflection that blinded me.  as the craft was at its closest point passing me i covered my one hand over my eye partiallly and at about 150 ft  the craft which appeared cloaked like a cloud appeared to me hooverinv with no emmissions sounding.  i made a perfect diagracraftcm of the perfectly  triangular craft with no engine smooth metalic bottom craft went slightly diangular up with metal that appeared to be messhed metal possible wiring underneath.  it had 3 to 4 different color lights that were random in pattern the size of the craft ws 35 -40 yds in legnth to almost an exact measure.  it then hoovered iver the trees as if it were just surveying.  for three to five months after the sighting i had drams as if u were on other planets trying to survive it was sureal dreams and when i woke up i would be spewingva secretion out of my mouth the dreams were of all different nature  and this happens every night.  there were times i would wake early in the morning and feel a very low pitch electromagnetic energy frequency in my ear vibrating like wom wom wom wom and i would sight  mesmerizsd and as soon as i moved the electric transmission stopped.  i have a 126 iq adhd so i pick up o  everything this is tge most bazzarre thing that has ever happend to me.
content.summary: Sudden feeling to go outside viewed craft approaching looked like a plane crashing from affar

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife where coming home from take out food half way home we where at a stop light i looked and saw this massive triangle in the sky,we rushed to the near apartment pulled out the cell phone and started to record as i yelled to 5 other people and watched this triangle hover and slowly move then the lights blinked out one at a time it was gone....
content.summary: Gigantic triangle

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were camping 8 miles nw of kingman,ks in a section of trees that my dad owns. i stayed in a hammock out by where our fire had been before it burned out, while my friend was sleeping in the passenger seat of my pickup. i was awoken from a deep sleep already looking in the direction of a bright silvery-white colored orb in the sky which proceeded to break off into more lights that were smaller and marigold in color and began making a semi-vertical line in the sky. i do not know what made me wake up to the lights, but i found out the next morning that my friend woke up already looking at the lights as well and he recalled not knowing what made him wake up either. the lights continued to make shapes in the sky, (circle, triangle, more vertical lines) and periodically the marigold orbs would collect back into the single bright, bigger, and silvery-white colored orb which would descend into the trees and move up and down and horizontal in the trees all while hovering around 4-5 feet off the ground. then would rapidly ascend back into the sky splitting back into smaller marigold colored orbs that would return to making shapes.  i continued to watch this for roughly 30 min or so and fell back asleep.  i was awoken a second time from a deep sleep roughly 2 hours later already already facing the direction of the same lights in the sky in the smaller marigold colored orbs in a vertical line in the sky. they made a few more shapes that i could roughly make out through the trees when the smaller orbs collected once more into the bigger, brighter orb which would descend into the trees move around and ascend back into the sky to make shapes again. this time i watched the orb light show for roughly 45 min or so when the orb one last time descended into the trees but this time meandered through coming closer to our camp and eventually stopped around 80-100 yards at the end of the old path near the log splitter and hovered (slightly wobbling in place with a glowing white aura) around 4-5 feet off the ground. it was close enough that the trees next to my hammock were flickering with light. the orb continued to hover in this location for a few more min when it shot like a bullet back to where it had previously been earlier in the trees, moved around a bit and ascended back into the sky rapidly split off into smaller marigold colored orbs and began making the same shapes in the sky. i continued to watch this till i fell asleep a second time. i was awoken a third time to a pack of coyotes which sounded to be in the general area of where the orb had been. the coyotes were howling when they got very aggressive sounding and i heard an animal sound which i have never heard in my life. it sounded close to a scream/howl but unlike any human or animal. i am an avid outdoorsman and have never heard any animal like this (especially in kansas). almost instantly after the scream/howl i heard a few of the coyotes started to whimper like a wounded dog would. after a second scream from the unknown animal there were only yelps of pain from the coyotes, a few seconds later pure silence. that was the end to any orbs or strange sounds i heard that night. once i fell back asleep i was not awoken again till the morning. my friend later confirmed seeing everything i saw that previous night. he did not hear the scream from strange animal or the yelping hurt coyotes but he did sleep inside the truck.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright metalic white light in sky that would separate into smaller merigold colored lights that would make shapes in sky and join back into one orb and desend into trees and move through trees changing directions then asend back into sky to make shapes

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:00 pm eastern time when my boyfriend and i decided to go outside and look at the stars since it was a pretty clear night out. we live in a pretty residential area, but it was nice and dark outside that night. we took a truck out in the field next to our house and positioned it so it was facing west, and then layed down on the hood of his truck with our backs to the windshield, so we could clearly see the sky. we noticed airplanes at first and saw a couple shooting stars as well, and what we also believed to be a satellite, so we were pretty excited at the activity we were seeing. probably 40 minutes had passed and the sky had been dark for a while without any planes flying across when all of a sudden an abnormally bright light appeared very high in the sky so that we were almost looking straight up. it was star-like; however, i am 22 and have never ever seen a star that bright. my boyfriend and i both exclaimed and asked one another if we were seeing the same thing without taking our eyes off of the light. the light continued to get brighter and then started to slowly move to the left. as it was moving to the left, the light started to diminish. my boyfriend looked at me bewildered but i kept my eyes on it, and by the time he looked back he couldn't see it anymore. but i still had my eyes on it and it was so faint i almost couldn't see it anymore, when all of a sudden with acceleration i've never seen an almost stationary object have, it zoomed off to the left and disappeared. i had goosebumps all over my body (writing this out i have goosebumps as well). my boyfriend had goosebumps also and we were both pretty shaken up over what we had just seen, because neither or us had ever seen anything like it. i had an eerie feeling watching it and an even more eerie feeling after watching it disappear. it didnt feel like a natural occurrence of something...
content.summary: An unnaturally light appeared, growing brighter. it started to moved to the right slowly and started to fade, then gained speed as it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My associate and i were working on a friends house on the corner of friends and beverly in whittier, approximately middle of august 2013.  while taking a break to smoke a cigarette, we both noticed the presidential airplane flying overhead.  the president was in town to do fund raising that week.  while the aircraft was ascending, to its (and mine) left, a strange boomerang aircraft was approaching the presidential aircraft, but at a lower altitude.  it looked almost like the flying wing of the 1940s, 1950s, but had no visible engines.  i looked at my friend and said it was weird to see an aircraft so close to the presidents plane, and he agreed.  as the boomerang looking vehicle got closer (or so it appeared from my vantage point) to the presidential airplane, it suddenly slowed to a crawl, turned left and hovered there for just a slight moment, then started spinning like a boomerang.  then suddenly, the craft flew upwards and disappeared while spinning at an amazing speed.

what made me notice the craft was it was heading towards the presidents plane, and it glistened brightly in the sun.

i was curious to see such an aircraft, thinking it was an old flying wing, but when it made its maneuvers, then flew straight up at amazing speed, i was shocked.  i looked at my friend, and he just said he never saw a thing because nobody would ever believe us.  i've kept my mouth shut since, but since i have seen numerous weird lights in the skies at night, i thought i would finally say something.
content.summary: Object flew toward oncoming presidential airplane, made left turn, then spun straight upwards disappearing from view.

content.detailedDescription:
I was swimming at dusk and noticed a bright object in the sky. it looked like a fireball and my first thought that a plane was on fire. the light moved at the same speed and direction while it was in sight. once he it was directly west of me it disappeared. within 3 to 5 minutes, another light appeared in the same area/direction. i tried to see if i could make out exactly what it was but couldn't. in the same manner as the first, it dissipated once directly west. then another/same object appeared again, this time it looked to be much closer then the previous sightings. still unable to make it out. i go in the house and to the front yard where the light is still showing up, and disappearing. this went on for about 30 minutes.

there was a firework display planned downtown cincinnati but it had not started at the time the lights were noticed. there were no news reports of anything like this. i have no idea what i saw.
content.summary: Orange/red light in sky traveling northwest

content.detailedDescription: O objeto veio da mesma direção da estrela d'alva ou vénus, e pairou por cima do meu prédio, a uma altura de um helicóptero, sem nada haver com um helicóptero, era uma luz bem forte, acompanhei da minha varanda até passar pelo meu prédio por cima.
content.summary: Um pouco maior que o brilho de venus
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription:
On 7/9/11 it was an unusually clear night. the moon was extremely bright that night so i grabbed my camera and tripod and began taking photos. as you can see the first image (moon.Png) is the original image taken from my camera. within the last 4 years i have taken a great interest the existence of alien life and ufo phenomena. so here i am 4 years later scanning the photo for anomalies. the second image (moon1.Png) is the photo with high contrast. when i raised the contrast i began seeing strange anomalies which i am hoping you can shed some light on these questionable objects. i have put together a collage (questionable objects.Png) which is numbered with arrows pointing to what i think are strange anomalies.

1. strange light source
2. mysterious line of light
3. strange pyramid shape with a straight line across and a straight line  
   down the middle (straight lines dont really occur in nature which led 
   me to question this object
4. strange light source
5. looks like a man made object
6. strange light source
7. strange cluster of light sources
8. strange light source
9. strange light source
10. almost looks like a cluster of man made architecture
11. almost certain this is a star but i would like to get that validated
12. strange cluster of light sources
13. another pyramid shape with straight line through the back and through 
    the middle.

these are just a few of the anomalies i have found but these ones stand out the most. in the original photo taken with my camera a lot of these anomalies cannot be seen. they can only be seen when the contrast is bumped up. can you please validate my findings?
content.summary: Photos taken on 7/9/11

content.detailedDescription:
My best friend took this to his grave   it scared him so bad ..And i havent reported    i know what i almost touched  .   my freind ralph and i were in southern oregon  summer of 1978  on east antelope  road  near dry creek landfill   and seen a light coming from mt laughlin    9,495 feet we knew thats strange thats not a flight path   as i watched the light came right over the  40-50 cattle in front of me ......The light was then over my head maybe  3 feet  i reached to touch this light  i was on my toes to reach it.... that circled me the circle was about 30-60 feet   the light was gone as fast as my friend saved me  i looked down and seen  the freshly plowed   soil and lite up               i then ran  out of the light circle   we  were safe     we knew what we seen     it knew ahead  40-50 miles ahead went over 50 head of cattle as it passed over cattle  it had seen us maybe 50 mi wa  and almos  s miles ahead for me and my bro     im ok    thanks to him yelling run dave kept 
 run     i was unafraid  on my tip toes  and almost  touched the object  ,,,we left the area  and met our girlfriends  on agate road /dry creek rd the lights  stayed close by  as if watching ...We told both girlfreinds  and showed them  it freaked them out    also   ...Next day   weeks and months ufos went to my bros house    i tried to take pictures   they kept coming back  over and over      this was so bad  his mom  took it out on me ..This is still a ufo hot spot contact me anytime  dave  602-687-0456
content.summary: Freind and i seen  strange light   was coming of of mt mclaughlin  thats 9,495 feet and not a normal flight path  to medford  oregon  for any plane

content.detailedDescription: I was sat in my conservatory watching the stars as i seen some strange lights in the distance.As i got up to go outside it got closer and closer. as it got above me you could not hear a thing. it was very low. lower than any plane ive ever seen. it was a dark grey triangle with lights on the points and a red glow in the middle. the light at the front was red/orange and pulsated and lit the whole front of the craft up and you could see it was metallic.  it was traveling very slowley. it was huge. totally freaked me out. ive seen many of ufos but nothing like this. been trying to put a explanation to it but i cant. i hear planes that are ten times higher. but this never made a sound.
content.summary: Large silent triangle with lights going from birmingham to burton

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were on the porch haveing a smoke at about 8:30 pm.  then 3 red lights shaped in a triangle flew rapidly from the nw. it stopped and hovered and changed to red, white and green strobeing light. it hovered in the eastern sky about 45 degrees above the horizon, right outside my hoyse. stribeing the red, white and green lights. we watched it for five minutes. then it turned to the south and disappeared. it reappeared as faint, flickering red, white and green lights. fainter than before. moved to the south and eventually disappeared. i tried to take a picture but couldn't get it to focus so i gave up. we were in awe. my boyfriend was a little shook up by the effortless hovering and the lights that were flashing as if rotateing around a disk like shape. there was no sound . i want to reiterate that the craft changed from triangleshape to rounded edges and borders the lights were rotateing around
content.summary: Three red lights in triangle shape flew over the house while my boyfriend and i were on the porch. it changed shape and began flashing white, red and green lights. hoveredfor 5 minutes, disappeared, reappeared as an intermittentwinkleing of red, whiteand
